mymetal.calculate.calqm package

Submodules

mymetal.calculate.calqm.kpoints module

kpoints module

This module provides functions for generating k-points in the Brillouin zone, which are essential for quantum mechanical simulations such as density functional theory (DFT). K-points are used to sample the reciprocal space in periodic systems.

Functions:

  • generate_kpoints: Generate a set of k-points for a given material structure.

Module contents

calqm module

This module provides functions related to quantum mechanics (QM) calculations, especially focused on generating k-points for material simulations. These tools are essential for performing density functional theory (DFT) or other electronic structure calculations.

Submodules:

  • kpoints: Contains functions for generating k-points for quantum mechanics calculations.
